About

G'nY is a semi-scientific magazine working on India's environment and new technology with an emphasis on human involvement in a climate change scenario.


Description

Geography and You, popularly known as GÃ¢â‚¬â„¢nY (English) and its counterpart Bhugol Aur Aap (Hindi) are two bi-monthly journo-mags that encompass various aspects of the multidisciplinary branch of semi-scientific study, embodying works in different genres of science, technology and sociology around the globe. The journo-mags have completed 13 gratifying years of success. The magazine has a readership of over 6 lakhs making it IndiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most authentic and popular science magazine !

 Know more:
 LIGHTS Research Foundation is our allied NGO. LIGHTS is an acronym for Learning in geography, humanities, technology and science. It undertakes conferences, training and outreach events. Please visit www.lights.org.in to know more.
